profile.name: Wes Bos
profile.bio: I create courses that make learning things like JavaScript easy and fun 🔥

analysis.career_trajectory: This developer has shown a wide range of skills and interests, from web components to 3D rendering and AI-powered projects. They have also demonstrated their ability to work with various programming languages, including TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. Their projects often involve creating tools and utilities for developers, showcasing their problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

technical_obsessions.evidence: [2025-05-01] media-chrome: Custom elements (web components) for making audio and video player controls that look great in your website or app. (Lang: TypeScript)
[2025-11-10] eye-ballz: AI generated + 3D eyeball thing (Lang: TypeScript), [2025-11-10] sticker-dream: voice activated sticker dreamer and printer.  (Lang: TypeScript)
[2025-09-23] capnweb: JavaScript/TypeScript-native, low-boilerplate, object-capability RPC system (Lang: None)

comment_analytics.communication_style: Asks deep architectural questions, Nitpicks code style
